instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE /app/frontend/src/index.css with the CSS variables provided in 'colors' section. REPLACE the existing values.
2. INSTALL fonts by adding the @import or <link> to index.html or index.css.
3. CONFIGURE tailwind.config.js to extend font families: 'serif': ['Libre Baskerville'], 'sans': ['DM Sans'].
5. IMPLEMENT the 'bento_hero' grid for the Landing Page.
7. ENSURE all forms (Order, Login) use Shadcn Form components but styled with 'inputs.default' rules.
8. FORBIDDEN: Do not use default Shadcn card styles for the Product Catalog. Use the 'cards.product' style defined above.
9. MULTI-LANGUAGE: Ensure all text is wrapped in translation keys (i18n) for Chinese/Spanish toggle.
10. THEME: Implement the 'Auto-detect' logic in a ThemeProvider.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark colors must be solid or subtle noise, NO gradients.
Micro-animations on everything: hover, focus, active.
Spacing: Use p-8 or p-12 where you'd normally use p-4.
Accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios (APCA) are met. Use data-testid on all interactive elements.
